Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 59th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2006...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Pittsburgh on 6/1/2006 (Going to CHA: 2B M. Billy. Going to PIT: 2B A. Cardenas)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles (A) on 2/4/2008 (Going to PIT: 1B L. Duda, RF D. Ortmeier. Going to LAA: 2B A. Cardenas)...
Injured on 6/3/2011 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2012 (Going to LAA: 3B P. Alvarez. Going to PIT: SS A. Cardenas)...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2012, off Andrew Cashner (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/2012, off Michael Pineda (CHN)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to New York (N) on 2/4/2013 (Going to PIT: CF G. Hernandez. Going to NYN: P L. Hochevar, SS A. Cardenas)...
Injured on 4/8/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/6/2016 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $3,750,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/14/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/7/2022, hitting .452 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 6/17/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 8/17/2023...
Hit 3 homeruns against Los Angeles (N), driving in 6 runs on 4/2/2024...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/8/2024, hitting .393 with 6 HR, 13 RBI...
Injured on 5/25/2024 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/1/2024, hitting .481 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
